Adamantine: This ultrahard metal adds to the quality of a weapon or suit of 갑옷. 무기 fashioned from adamantine have a natural ability to 바이패스 hardness when sundering 무기 or attacking objects, ignoring hardness less than 20. 갑옷 made from adamantine grants its wearer 피해 축소 of 1/– if it’s 빛 갑옷, 2/– if it’s medium 갑옷, and 3/– if it’s heavy 갑옷. Adamantine is so costly that 무기 and 갑옷 made from it are always of masterwork quality; the masterwork cost is included in the prices given below. Thus, adamantine 무기 and ammunition have a +1 enhancement bonus on 명중 굴림, and the 갑옷 check penalty of adamantine 갑옷 is lessened by 1 compared to ordinary 갑옷 of its type. Items without metal parts cannot be made from adamantine. An arrow could be made of adamantine, but a quarterstaff could not.

Only 무기, 갑옷, and 방패 normally made of metal can be fashioned from adamantine. 무기, 갑옷 및 방패 normally made of steel that are made of adamantine have one-third more 히트 포인트 than normal. Adamantine has 40 히트 포인트 per inch of thickness and hardness 20.

Any wooden or mostly wooden item (such as a bow, an arrow, or a spear) made from darkwood is considered a masterwork item and weighs only half as much as a normal wooden item of that type. Items not normally made of wood or only partially of wood (such as a battleaxe or a mace) either cannot be made from darkwood or do not gain any special benefit from being made of darkwood. 드래곤둥지: Armorsmiths can work with the 숨기 of 드래곤 to produce 갑옷 or 방패 of masterwork quality. One 드래곤 produces enough 숨기 for a single suit of masterwork 숨기 갑옷 for a creature one size category smaller than the 드래곤. By selecting only choice scales and bits of 숨기, an armorsmith can produce one suit of masterwork banded mail for a creature two sizes smaller, one suit of masterwork half-plate for a creature three sizes smaller, or one masterwork breastplate or suit of full plate for a creature four sizes smaller. In each case, enough 숨기 is available to produce a small or large masterwork 방패 in addition to the 갑옷, provided that the 드래곤 is Large or larger.

Because 드래곤둥지 갑옷 isn’t made of metal, 드루이드 can wear it without penalty.

Iron, Cold: This iron, mined deep underground, known for its effectiveness against fey creatures, is forged at a lower temperature to preserve its delicate properties. 무기 made of cold iron cost twice as much to make as their normal counterparts. Also, any magical enhancements cost an additional 2,000 gp.

Items without metal parts cannot be made from cold iron. An arrow could be made of cold iron, but a quarterstaff could not.

A double weapon that has only half of it made of cold iron increases its cost by 50%.

Mithral: Mithral is a very rare silvery, glistening metal that is lighter than iron but just as hard. When worked like steel, it becomes a wonderful material from which to create 갑옷 and is occasionally used for other items as well. In the case of 무기, this lighter weight does not change a weapon’s size category or the ease with which it can be wielded (whether it is 빛, one-handed, or two-handed). Items not primarily of metal are not meaningfully affected by being partially made of mithral. (A longsword can be a mithral weapon, while a scythe cannot be.)
